https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nOVhX69EAxtSKEEnr5UcSd5UVci.jpg In June 2013, Laura Poitras and reporter Glenn Greenwald flew to Hong Kong for the first of many meetings with Edward Snowden. She brought her camera with her. Citizenfour
